title: [NEW] Having issues Patching 5.10? Click Here!
body:
Hey all,

With every new patch comes the possibility that some players may experience issues properly patching correctly. There are two main errors that can occur:

> ***Launcher/Patcher never pops up, or disappears after you press "LAUNCH"***

This can be caused by corruption with the patcher itself or it failed to properly self-patch. Additionally, it may be due to some issues with the configuration of your computer system's permissions (meaning it can't properly save the files in the correct location). To resolve this, make sure to complete all the steps in our [Patching Issues Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues)!


> ***Patcher stops/errors out at 33%, Patcher fails at 99%, or a general "Unspecified Error has occurred" message***

These are usually connection related errors. Either your computer is unable to maintain a stable connection, or a 3rd party security program is blocking League of Legends from properly patching. Many of the most common Anti-virus programs [have already whitelisted LoL](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq3), however make sure to update yours to the latest version!

Also, even though you may have set specific exceptions in place before for your security program, League of Legends has gone through a major update. Therefore, your security program may recognize the old version of League of Legends, but not the new version. 

To get these issues resolved ASAP, make sure to go through our [Connection Issues Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)!

> ***Still Having Issues Patching? Itching to get First Blood?***

If you are still unable to properly patch League of Legends, make sure to [submit a new ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to us here in Player Support where we can investigate your issue in-depth, and get it resolved. If you do submit a ticket, make sure to include the following:

1) [Network Analysis ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq1)

2) [Network Info Log](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq4)

3) [Process List](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq3)

replies.body: It gives that its scanning files and is just doing this forever, any solutions?

Originally Posted by Tseu Tsey  View Post
Hi Guys

I had the same error too, did what I did the last time I got this error and its worked 

Go to your: rads\projects\lol_patcher\releases\0.0.0.7......co py the S_OK file that you find there

Then copy it into the following folders: rads\projects\lol_air_client\releases\0.0.0.84
rads\projects\lol_air_client\releases\0.0.1.112

Then try run your lol launcher again....worked for me

My launcher gets stuck at 32% and ive tried everything to try to fix it and nothing worked. Please help! (PC) {{champion:32}} {{item:3070}}
Same situation, except on mac.

So I have been trying all of these solutions the past 3 days with no luck until i read that it might just be an unstable connection that is stopping it from Downloading.

MY SOLUTION, which helped me at least start the download: go into your command prompt (click the start menu and search "cmd" press enter). once inside the command prompt, type (with out the quotes) "ipconfig /release" wait for it to allow you to type after it creates a long list of stuff, and then type "ipconfig /renew". This basically resets the connection your computer has to the internet creating a temporary stable connection allowing the download to take place.

The only downside I see with this is the fact you have to repeat this step every time you see the (x kbps) declining.

Hope this helps some of you in the same situation! sorry if it doesn't help everyone, but it helped me!

Cheers!

So, very interesting thing we can see after renderers initialized and client_id received. We see how client sending message to server and HAS NO RESPONCE!

Please SUPPORT, PLEASE give us some real technical information WHY ur servers not responding!What's wrong with our comps?
Patcher stops with 269 MB remaining. Download speed goes down to 0 KBps, and after about 10 minutes, the entire patcher crashes, and I get a bugsplat error. Any solutions?

I've tried literally everything from across every single thread out there, with disappointing results.
Tried completely removing League from my pc, reinstalling it with the installation files from, EUW, EUNE, OCE and NA. I came across the same problem every time; the patcher fails to open. The logo appears for a short period of time, then disappears. Flushing DNS, reinstalling Microsoft .Net 3.5 and so on did not fix this.

I tried booting my pc in **safe mode** (with network), and opened the patcher from there, which seemed to work perfectly fine! Hope this may help some of you out there, have a nice day! :)

Any solutions?

P.S. tried to copy paste S_OK files into the 2 file locations for lol_air_client, still did not work. My internet is fine (I AM on this thread after all) and my computer is fine as well (hence my ability to play other games fine).

Thanks!...if anyone ever responds, that is....
